feed.title: Unregistry Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Unregistry: v0.1.0
entry.content:
Welcome to the initial release of unregistry! üöÄ

I built this because I was tired of the registry dance just to move Docker images between my servers. Now you can push images directly where they need to run with a single command: docker pussh myapp:latest user@server I hope you'll love it! ‚ù§Ô∏è

Changelog

  • 60033edcc2d12e0a697afbf2e4c16d88d0f3f5d4 Initial commit
  • d32ab22f027f7edbebbad0c4ce0fae1c9043c276 Merge pull request #1 from psviderski/tonyo/fix-port-process-1
  • e66835af88179f81ca30eae6149e8b1870443d5a chore: add 'Test and build' github actions workflow to test and build Docker image
  • fc070af8b13da4fe33b241bd484e77c0b501bdcf chore: add demo video to README
  • 47fa2bcc17651c37c872a6a80974ba8d0c876f2c chore: add goreleaser configuration to publish releases with changelogs
  • f0b4e1d2e556c24e46dd796358085c53a5b41c2e chore: address TODOs and make discovery operations unsupported
  • 3755edd6c5a37962d6edb8faa3b9d8c2f77d73a9 chore: cmd params

  • c85a9916ae655636a623746326eef6b32d981891 chore: refactor, address TODOs for blobStore
  • 64ee796467cf136f08801707ce8efe4c1cc05b01 chore: registry/repository wiring
  • ce484ce174cd5acc9da9183b06b40a3323cb68c4 chore: remove GOOS/GOARCH vars from go build, increase CI timeout 10->20min

  • e662ff6cf060097516b19b03d1f7f3d02738defd chore: set garbage collection labels for image content before creating an image
  • 7b62fe2cfa114fd1ee8ea343a187997d896db591 chore: set up mise, update .gitignore
  • 9b90b85352afc197b8f4c8ad2e34e1ca272086f8 chore: split Dockerfile into two for release and test to cross-compile on CI
  • 8e47df1d9bf6cbdb3ea370fb232c59e9cdef1634 chore: tidy go mod
  • bd5255d26f14a1f4aea8520a633708db458e672e chore: update command description, clean up flags
  • f953957ea691160a7e73bd670787c7f0bcb53b48 chore: update docker-pussh-demo video
  • 5008a6355e05209c63812f17844c43c9e030fd12 chore: update registry app to use containerd backend
  • 19f18eca19f6b2eceb0c5bf4b74b541ef4dcfeb1 chore: use default containerd namespace in dind image
  • eeb30639548a4e23b7298b8926c2a8c346fb591d chore: white space
  • eaa52ef121c44d661776e6525e297c04ffe2914c feat(docker-pussh): check remote docker command permissions and use sudo if needed

  • bc89e01762cc77786f0ff7c24dff7a7e682abd48 feat(docker-pussh): push to remote unregistry and pull from it if not using containerd image store

  • e335fd0222568cbf48270e9fe802aa020ba8e514 feat: init registry backed by containerd content and image stores

  • 6397b5be17fb2a93fd2504c9642b4c29de626e2c fix: docker push when not using containerd image store locally, update test

  • 3e76008e38699d21c4687ca31fb2f318d192b687 fix: use canonical image name in tag service only to preserve original repo name
  • 0eb4c4413957c790f8bd4bbf6192e1c378f5179c fix: use canonical repo name, create or update image in containerd image store
  • 3bcb8b95b68a898f3a5b25f638ae4d2206445c9e fix: use moby namespace for containerd by default in dind
  • 972e1ddff342b0f3b8070b34344bfdf4b0f4ea1d readme: add logo
  • 06916b32483b72c90c41ea349feb07306017049e readme: clarify unregistry stores and serves
  • e2c7cb4df7f1a62f6d59b433ac9c961cddced586 readme: header and why unregistry?
  • bce29798c627d4166c2c189e8e5d7fc250b6d21c readme: installation, usage, use cases, requirements

  • f82a57e1f2de252ce4a54ad53b5ec0c750a2a30a readme: minor title
  • a551e775e0e900d5c99bb7fc6478f6f694b0c6ce readme: remove duplicate bullet in requirements

entry.title: New release for Unregistry: v0.1.2
entry.content:
A housekeeping patch release without actual functional changes.

Changelog

  • 4306c47e49b7f1b7942aa2dc48b947bdbc92a6ed chore: Add .editorconfig
  • c4bf40468c76aa69ef1f59d0634bd39b98fc19d5 chore: Rename release script
  • 8ab51ee41ed8cfcfa357596448e47c001c93ed98 chore: load env vars from .env by mise
  • 22be4eb813f33b2bd2fc65b3fc18dff2faea831d fix: Add missing dummy file
  • 336495bb60edfdbd555a2ce88a739003220b40e6 fix: Replace sed with perl (hehe) for compatibility
  • 7714dc4ef3b12e82aff528b86b35dfe9b1cde037 readme: correct the Save/Load approach (#26)
  • 0ec314861de28a8fbc44211058c58a8ab89b4bad release: Bump version to 0.1.2

entry.title: New release for Unregistry: v0.1.3
entry.content:
A corrective release to fix the Homebrew release process.

Breaking

  • Homebrew installation method: docker-pussh executable is now distributed as a cask, not a formula. The switch was made mostly because goreleaser no longer officially supports Homebrew formulae. To avoid errors when upgrading docker-pussh, it is recommended to remove and then install it from scratch: brew uninstall psviderski/tap/docker-pussh brew tap psviderski/tap brew install psviderski/tap/docker-pussh

Changelog

  • d3c3f35ca57d7fede9feaeac4f1e8cba795dc3c3 fix: Homebrew tap repository owner
  • 9245dcf8196ef506e750b5117a9ff9e6a51df79b release: Bump version to 0.1.3
